content: copy of this pattern for personal use only in whole or part darnknitanyway com editing and using the pattern as the basis for another pattern or as a template publishing transmitting emailing this pattern to others 651 342 1386 or posting online in whole or part is strictly prohibited scarf with no name page 2 slip_stitch sequence starting with color 2 work slip_stitch pattern as follows alternating color 2 with color 1 every 2 row loosely carry second color up the side when alternating colors row 1 color 2 kfb sl1 k2 to marker sm sl1 sm k2 sl1 to last stitch kfb row 2 color 2 kfb k1 sl1wyif k2 to marker sm sl1wyif sm k2 sl1wyif to last 2 st k1 kfb row 3 color 1 kfb k to st before marker kfb sm k1 sm kfb k to last st kfb row 4 color 1 kfb k to last st kfb row 5 color 2 kfb k2 sl1 to 2 st before marker k2 sm sl1 sm k2 sl1 to last 3 sts k2 kfb row 6 color 2 kfb k3 sl1wyif k2 to 3 sts before marker sl1wyif k1 kfb sm sl1wyif sm kfb k1 sl1wyif k2 to last 2 st k1 kfb row 7 color 1 kfb k to last st kfb row 8 color 1 kfb k to last st kfb row 9 color 2 kfb k1 sl1 k2 to 3 st before marker sl1 k1 kfb sm sl1 sm kfb k1 sl1 k2 to last 3 st sl1 k1 kfb row 10 color 2 kfb k2 sl1wyif k2 to 1 st before marker k1 sm sl1wyif sm k3 sl1wyif k2 to last 4 st sl1wyif k2 kfb row 11 color 1 kfb k to last st kfb row 12 color 1 kfb k to st before marker kfb sm k1 sm kfb k to last st kfb break color 1 89 sts continue wo rking with color 2 only repeat body row 1-6 four times 12 garter ridges in color 2 153 st starting with color 3 work slip_stitch sequence row 1-12 alternating color 3 with color 2 every 2 row row 1 & 2 will be color 3 ro ws 3 & 4 will be color 2 etc break color 2 185 sts continue working with color 3 only repeat body row 1-6 four times 12 garter ridges in color 3 249 st starting with color 1 work slip_stitch sequence row 1-12 alternating with color 3 every 2 row row 1 & 2 will be color 1 row 3 & 4 will be color 3 etc break color 3 281 sts continue working with color 1 only repeat body row 1-6 twice 313 sts final slip st itch sequence starting with color 2 work as follows alternating with color 1 every 2 row row 1 color 2 kfb k1 sl1 k1 to marker sm sl1 sm k1 sl1 to last 2 st k1 kfb row 2 color 2 kfb k2 sl1wyif k1
